name: Dream dev
description:
Weekly Game Jam 159

Theme: Café

Date the developer of the game  in a cute café.

FAQ.
  • Are the conversations with the dream dev just agreeing and disagreeing in real life as wel?
    • No, they are a lot more fun and interesting.
  • Is the dream dev just a two dimensional sprite?
    • No, the dev is a three dimensional EXTRA THICC human being.
